name: Moon Curse of the Doppelganger Demo
name_original: Moon Curse of the Doppelganger Demo
description:
Moon Curse of the Doppelganger is a 2d Platformer game that I made a challenge for Halloween Demo. The idea on this is to make a game that plays similar the NES Ghost N Ghouls with some parts from Castlevania Aria of Sorrow (the soul use ability) . I made a quick demo to try out and see what players think. 

This demo does not have any player live so if you could survive being hit or going in water. 

For controls click on the Setting icon on the top right. You can lower the volume as needed
